about_the_game:
Commuter action abounds along the bustling 4-track West Coast Main Line in Train Sim World 5. Dash through the complex layout of London Euston aboard the hard-working Class 350 and embark across the Northwest corner of the Capital to Milton Keynes, with expresses and stoppers alike.

Britain’s busiest and oldest inter-city railway into London, the West Coast Main Line, stretches northward out of the brutalist hub of Euston and plays host to over 30 million passengers a year. This monster mainline runs at capacity all hours of the day, with fast and slow lines offering local and longer-distance commuter destinations.

Accelerating through the dense boroughs of Camden and Brent, the WCML is accompanied by further passenger and freight action. The Bakerloo line surfaces at Queens Park, and shares tracks with the Lioness line. At the massive complex of yards near Wembley, Southern join into the fray with their unique cross-London, dual-voltage commuter service.

In Train Sim World 5, become a driver or conductor aboard the popular Class 350/1, and get busy on the many service patterns between Euston and Milton Keynes. Accompany the action with the Southern Class 377/2, duly laden with pantograph for duty north of the Thames. Get a taste of classic 72 Stock with the 7-mile surface section of the Bakerloo line.

Key Features

  • West Coast Main Line route between London Euston and Milton Keynes Central

  • BR Class 350/1 dual-voltage EMU in Northwestern livery

  • BR Class 377/2 dual-voltage EMU in Southern livery

  • 1972 Mk2 Tube Stock in London Underground livery

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs

  • True-to-life performance and handling

  • Accessible Tutorial on the Training Center

  • A number of engaging Scenarios and an authentic timetable

  • Complete the WCML timetable with the Avanti BR Class 390

  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services

  • Timetable layers add additional playable and AI traffic, including Lioness line services with the Suffragette line’s BR Class 710/2

  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete

  • Explore the route and trains in Free Roam

  • Hop to Bakerloo Line (available separately) on foot

  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 9.0 GB
